results.title: Match Results
results.subtitle: View the latest match results and tournament outcomes.

profileSetup.title: Complete Your Athlete Profile
profileSetup.description: To participate in matches as an athlete, please complete your profile setup.

review.title: Review Athlete Profile Information
review.description: Confirm your details before submitting. Please use your exact first and last name as it appears on your official documents.
review.importantMessage: Please use your real name exactly as it appears on official documents. This ensures accurate matching and helps maintain the integrity of the platform.
review.step1: Your athlete profile creation request will be sent to our admin team
review.step2: Admins will verify and add your tennis information
review.step3: You'll receive an email notification when your profile is ready

checking.title: Searching Athlete Database...
checking.description: We're checking if you already exist as a player in our database.
checking.explanation: This will match you with your existing player profile so you can participate in matches as yourself.
checking.optional: This is optional - you can skip and continue playing as a NetProphet user.
checking.benefit: Claiming your athlete profile lets you compete in matches and track your tennis career!

form.title: Enter Your Name
form.description: We need your name to search for your athlete profile in our database. Please use your exact first and last name as it appears on your official documents.
form.aboutPlayerProfilesDescription: We'll search our player database to match you with an existing profile. This allows you to participate in matches as yourself.
form.aboutPlayerProfilesOptional: ‚ú® You can skip this and continue as a NetProphet user anytime!
form.termsLabel: I accept the terms and conditions
form.termsDescription: By providing your name, you allow us to match you with existing athlete profiles in our database.

errors.termsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions

result.playerFoundDescription: You can claim this profile to participate in matches and activate your Athlete Card.
result.claimDescription: By claiming this profile, you will be able to participate in matches and tournaments as this player.
result.multipleMatchesBanner: Select your player profile to participate in matches as yourself, or create a new one if you're not listed.
result.singleMatchBanner: We found a matching player profile. Claim it to participate in matches as yourself, or skip to continue as a regular NetProphet user.
result.noMatchBanner: No existing athlete profile found. You can request a new athlete profile to compete in matches, or skip to continue as a NetProphet user.
result.termsLabel: I accept the terms and conditions
result.termsDescription: By claiming this profile, you agree to participate in matches and tournaments as this athlete.
result.noPlayerFoundDescription: To participate as an athlete in the app and have your matches available for predictions, you can create a new athlete profile.
result.createDescription: By creating a player profile, you can participate as a tennis player in the app. Your matches will be available for predictions by other users and you can participate in tournaments. An admin will review and approve your request.
result.nameUsageDescription: This name will be used to create your athlete profile.
result.credentialsNotice: Use your real name as it appears on official documents for accurate tournament matching.
result.skipDescription: Skip to continue as a regular user. You can set up your player profile later.

success.title: Profile Setup Complete!
success.description: Your profile has been successfully set up.
success.claimedDescription: Your profile has been successfully set up.
success.claimedMessage: Your athlete profile has been successfully linked to your account. You can now view your statistics and match history!
success.requestedDescription: The profile creation request has been submitted to our admin team. You will receive a notification once it's reviewed and approved.
success.requestedMessage: Your profile creation request has been submitted to our admin team. You'll receive a notification once it's been reviewed and approved.
success.step1Claimed: Explore your player statistics and match history
success.step1Requested: Wait for admin approval (you'll receive an email notification)
success.step3: Earn coins and climb the leaderboard!

multipleMatches.title: Multiple Athletes Found
multipleMatches.description: We found multiple athletes with matching information. Please select your profile.
multipleMatches.createInstead: None of these are me - Create New Profile

selectPlayer.title: Select Your Profile
selectPlayer.description: We found multiple athletes with a matching surname. Please select your profile:

auth.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain uppercase, lowercase, and numbers
auth.passwordTooWeak: Password is too weak. Please use a stronger password.
auth.checkEmailToConfirm: Check your email to confirm your account!
auth.passwordResetSuccess: Password updated successfully! Redirecting to sign in...

matches.title: Tennis Matches
matches.loading: Monitor live tennis events and place your predictions
matches.selectMatchDescription: Choose a match from the sidebar to view details and make predictions
matches.matchNotFoundDescription: Details for this match are not available
matches.makePredictionsDescription: Choose from multiple prediction types to maximize your points!
matches.predictExactScore: Predict the exact score for each set. {player} wins all sets.
matches.whoWinsEachSet: Who wins each set based on your {result} prediction?
matches.tiebreakScoresSelected: You've selected tiebreak scores for some sets. Here you can predict the detailed tiebreak scores within those sets.
matches.setEndedInTiebreak: Set {setNumber} ended in a tiebreak. Predict the detailed tiebreak score:
matches.superTiebreakDescription: Since this is a 2-1 match in amateur format, there will be a 10-point super tiebreak instead of a 3rd set.
matches.superTiebreakWinnerDescription: The super tiebreak winner must be {player} to match your overall prediction.
matches.winsSuperTiebreak: Wins super tiebreak (required for match win)
matches.selectMatchesToAdd: Select matches to add to your slip
matches.combineAllPredictions: Combine all predictions for massive rewards with bonus multipliers!
matches.parlayBenefits: üíé Parlay Benefits: Higher rewards, bonus multipliers, and streak boosters!
matches.unlockParlayMode: to unlock exciting parlay mode with bonus rewards!

athletes.title: Athletes

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.description: Compete with other athletes and climb the leaderboard to win exciting prizes! Your ranking is based on your prediction accuracy, win streaks, and total points earned.
pointsCalculationList: Correct predictions earn points based on match difficulty
Power-ups can double your points for specific matches
Daily login bonuses add extra points to your total
howToClimbList: Maintain win streaks for bonus multipliers
Log in daily for bonus points
leaderboard.learnAboutPoints: Learn about points calculation, prizes, and strategies
leaderboard.completeGuide: Complete guide to climbing the leaderboard

rewards.title: Rewards
rewards.earnCoinsDescription: Make accurate predictions to earn coins. The more correct picks, the more coins you get!
rewards.redeemCoinsDescription: Use your coins to unlock premium features, exclusive merchandise, and special experiences.
rewards.raritySystemDescription: Items come in different rarities: Common, Rare, Epic, and Legendary. Rarer items offer better value!
rewards.limitedTimeDescription: Some items are featured or discounted for a limited time. Don't miss out on great deals!
rewards.paymentSuccessful: Payment successful! Your coins have been added to your account.
rewards.redeemDescription: Redeem your Coins for exclusive rewards and premium features
rewards.coinTopUpDescription: Purchase coins to unlock powerful upgrades and boost your prediction performance
rewards.noCoinPacks: No coin packs available at the moment.
rewards.powerUpsDescription: Boost your prediction performance with powerful upgrades
rewards.safeSlipsDescription: Protect your predictions from one wrong pick. Perfect for risky parlays or uncertain matches.
rewards.safeSlipsEffect: One wrong prediction won't lose your slip
rewards.safeParlaySlipDescription: Protect your parlay predictions from one wrong pick. Perfect for risky parlay combinations.
rewards.safeParlaySlipEffect: One wrong prediction won't lose your parlay slip
rewards.streakMultiplierDescription: Boost your streak points by 50% for 3 days. Great for climbing the leaderboard faster.
rewards.streakMultiplierEffect: 2x multiplier for your next win streak
rewards.doubleXPMatchDescription: Double your points from a specific match. Use strategically on high-stakes matches.
rewards.doubleXPMatchEffect: Double XP for your next match
rewards.proTipsDescription: Power ups are consumed when used. Choose wisely and save them for important moments!
rewards.proTipsEffect: Expert analysis for your next match
rewards.pleaseSignIn: Please sign in to purchase power-ups
